Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI for me is mostly used when I want to ask questions with simple answers, like if I forgot something. Anything abstract may have to be done through asking the teacher themselves

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response:
The problem with getting feedback from your teacher is that it takes a long time, and by the time they reach out, you would have done most of the work.

GenAI serves as a basis and a last resort if I don't fully understand things
